subject: clarification
author: billliscomb
full_text:
OK, so maybe I went over the top yesterday describing my laptop 
setup and how I use it  sorry.  I did post a bunch of EVPs 
under "Laptop EVPs" in the files.  What I didn't make clear is that I'd 
really appreciate some comments/critiques/suggestions on what I've 
done.  I've gotten a lot of stuff and would really like to run it by 
someone else.  I asked my wife, and she got a blank look, blinked 
twice, turned and walked away.  My teenage son listened to one clip 
twice, heard what I did, then had more important stuff to do.  So, it 
would be nice to get some feedback on what I've done so far.
   I've read that "lower entities" come across more on EVPmaker, but so 
far I haven't had any rude experiences  yet.  Two days ago I forgot to 
start the sessions with protection prayer/rules of engagement, and 
right away a Scottish voice said, "Aye, it smells in here."  I've got 
another folder worth of stuff to upload, but want to get some comments 
about my previous files first..
 I've noticed two Bills here already, so to avoid confusion, I'll go by 
Willy.
Thanks
Willy
